Automata.FAGenerator

Class CNFAtoDFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automata.FAGenerator.CNFAtoDFA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INFAtoDFA

    public class CNFAtoDFA
extends java.lang.Object
implements INFAtoDFA
    A class which converts an NFA to a DFA.
